Class Connect4Host

  • java.lang.Object
    • Application.Connect4Host
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Connect4User

    public class Connect4Host
extends java.lang.Object
implements Connect4User
    Author:
    Nick Hale Host object that hold that data and stream necesary to host a game of connect 4 ahead
